features: You will receive one 26.2 fluid ounce bottle of Shampoo, one 26.2 fluid ounce bottle of Conditioner and one 16 fluid ounce bottle of Deep Conditioner
PERFECT FOR hair types straight to curly
USE THEM TO cleanse, condition, deeply moisturize, detangle, and prime your hair for styling
FORMULATED WITH avocado oil and moisturizing agents
FRAGRANCE of light citrus and fresh florals
body.description: Ready to have your hair world rocked? You have just found the ultimate moisturizing and detangling hair care routine that will prime you for your perfect style. And it's perfect for hair types straight to curly.This avocado-oil-infused moisture trifecta contains one 26.2 oz bottle of Aussie Miracle Moist Shampoo, one 26.2 oz bottle of Aussie Miracle Moist Conditioner, and one 16 oz bottle of Aussie 3 Minute Miracle Moist Detangling Deep Conditioner. And of course, they're all made without parabens and are Certified PETA Cruelty-Free.Aussie Miracle Moist Shampoo soaks your strands in hydration while gently cleansing. Aussie Miracle Moist Conditioner is made with an ultra-rich formula that transforms thirsty hair to give you slip-through-your-fingers softness.And for the final, must-have step in your new routine? Aussie 3 Minute Miracle Moist Detangling Deep Conditioner. It quenches dry, knotted hair in just 3 minutes—and detangles fast with up to 90% less hair breakage.* It's amazing what 3x more moisture** can do in such little time.Finally, a simple routine that gives your hair all the moisture it deserves. Say goodbye to painful detangling and breakage—and hello silky, ready-to-style strands. AUSSome hair days, here you come!

reviews.reviewText: Amazing on 4a type hair , it keeps your curls healthy and popping . Love that it comes in an oversized bottle been using this for months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the way it makes hair feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smell of this set is GREAT.After 2 shampoo washes the hair feels & smells clean - I usually have to go in with a 3rd wash depending on the shampoo.The conditioner doesn’t make the hair feel soft not hard and dry either more in between.The conditioner makes my child’s curls defined and tend to look hydrated so it’s shiny and bouncy.My daughter loves the smell of the 3 min leave in detangler it does make the process of untangling her hair simpler and her hair looks hydrated even after a couple of days.The reason I don’t give it a full 5 stars is because if I straighten her hair it’s frizzy VERY frizzy.This works perfect for me on a wash and go curl day.

reviews.reviewText: I have straight fine hair and my daughters both have curls. It works so well on all our hair, leaving it clean and really soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. My hair is shiny and tangle free.

I'm not one to typically write reviews, let alone feeling the need to write a novel after only one use of the product.. but wow! I have very thin, frizz prone, naturally curly hair (ringlets & waves) that I stopped dyeing and harsh heat styling about 3 years ago - its helped my hair grow longer but moisture and dry brittle feel was something I could never escape, causing my hair to tangle and frizz instantly, constantly and needing to carry around a brush in my bag.Well holy crap. This stuff is great, I was afraid like some of the other products I've tried that it would be too much moisture and weighs my hair down or makes it feel kinda greasy (my thin hair is very prone to oiliness). It's day 2 after my wash and my hair still feels very soft, no visibly signs of grease/oil build up, and I haven't needed to brush my hair since I styled/dried it with my blowout brush (the only heat I use on my hair - it's a game changer to those trying to reduce damage from straighteners and curling irons). The frizz control I'm seeing overall with my hair is great. I used the 3 minute mask as well and the double up of the conditioner and 3 minute mask does not leave any sort of residue or oily/heavy feel.I've tried everything, my hairdresser friends even take me to the discount beautify supplies stores to try to find good quality products that work for my hair.. nothing has compared to these products so far, 10/10!

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality is good, packaging cld be better
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo arrived leaking all over, and the pump doesn’t seem to work. But the shampoo feels and smells great
I’ve enjoyed this product very much. Will keep buying it for sure. Great value for the price I paid.
Second time purchasing this and second time that that large conditioner pump was broken and don't pump...so frustrating...but I poured conditioner into another bottle.
Il nettoit très bien,il laisse les cheveux lisse, sans static et laisse une bonne odeur 👍
